------=_NextPart_000_002E_01C3764B.DDE939A0
Content-Type: text/plain;
charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Rob
Many moons ago I did write some code to enable the use of images as  bump
maps.
After a bit of diging though my archives I found the following.

Attached is the modified source from R2.1 and some documentation.
I think the WARNING in the texpict.html says it all ;-)

HTH
Simon
simon.crone@optusnet.com.au



----- Original Message -----
To: <radiance-general@radiance-online.org>
Cc: <crones@cs.curtin.edu.au>
Sent: Saturday, September 06, 2003 7:18 AM

an
walls
